verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> there was <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> a <S%G2563>reed<s%> <S%G3364>like<s%> unto a <S%G4464>rod<s%>: and one32, 2476 <S%G3004>said<s%>, <S%G1453>Rise<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3354>measure<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2379>altar<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> them that worship4352, 1722 <S%G846>therein<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G833>court<s%> which is <S%G2081>without<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> <S%G1544>leave<s%> <S%G2081>without<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3354>measure<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%>; <S%G3754>for<s%> it hath been <S%G1325>given<s%> unto the <S%G1484>nations<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> shall they tread under <S%G3961>foot<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> and <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3376>months<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I will <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G1417>unto<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they shall <S%G4395>prophesy<s%> a <S%G5507>thousand<s%> two <S%G1250>hundred<s%> and <S%G1835>threescore<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%>, <S%G4016>clothed<s%> in <S%G4526>sackcloth<s%>.

These <S%G3778><s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> the <S%G1417>two<s%> olive <S%G1636>trees<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3087>candlesticks<s%>, <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2316>Lord<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G2309>desireth<s%> to <S%G91>hurt<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G1607>proceedeth<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2719>devoureth<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2190>enemies<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> shall <S%G2309>desire<s%> to <S%G91>hurt<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, in this <S%G3779>manner<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> be <S%G615>killed<s%>.

These <S%G3778><s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G1849>power<s%> to <S%G2808>shut<s%> the <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G5205>it<s%> <S%G1026>rain<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1722>during<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4394>prophecy<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> the <S%G5204>waters<s%> to <S%G4762>turn<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3960>smite<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> with <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4127>plague<s%>, as <S%G3740>often<s%> <S%G1437>as<s%> they shall <S%G2309>desire<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> they shall have <S%G5055>finished<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3141>testimony<s%>, the <S%G2342>beast<s%> that <S%G305>cometh<s%> up out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G12>abyss<s%> shall <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G4171>war<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3528>overcome<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G615>kill<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>their<s%> dead <S%G4430>bodies<s%> lie <S%G1909>in<s%> the <S%G4113>street<s%> of the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%>, <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G4153>spiritually<s%> is <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G4670>Sodom<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G125>Egypt<s%>, <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2257>their<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> was <S%G4717>crucified<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G1537>among<s%> the <S%G2992>peoples<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5443>tribes<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1100>tongues<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> do men <S%G991>look<s%> upon <S%G846>their<s%> dead <S%G4430>bodies<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G2255>half<s%>, and2532, 863 <S%G863>suffer<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> dead <S%G4430>bodies<s%> to be <S%G5087>laid<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> a <S%G3418>tomb<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> that <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> make <S%G2165>merry<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they shall <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G1435>gifts<s%> one to <S%G240>another<s%>; <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G928>tormented<s%> <S%G3588>them<s%> that <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G2255>half<s%> the <S%G4151>breath<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1909>into<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G3588>them<s%> that <S%G2334>beheld<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Come <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G5602>hither<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> they went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3507>cloud<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2190>enemies<s%> <S%G2334>beheld<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G1096>there<s%> was a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4578>earthquake<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the tenth <S%G1182>part<s%> of the <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> there were killed615, 3686 <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4578>earthquake<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G5505>thousand<s%> <S%G444>persons<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3062>rest<s%> <S%G1096>were<s%> <S%G1719>affrighted<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> to the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G1442>seventh<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4537>sounded<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G1096>followed<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5456>voices<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G932>said<s%>, The kingdom of the <S%G2889>world<s%> is <S%G1096>become<s%> the kingdom of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> he shall <S%G936>reign<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever<s%>.

saying <S%G3004><s%>, We <S%G2168>give<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G2168>thanks<s%>, O <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, the <S%G3841>Almighty<s%>, who <S%G5607>art<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> who <S%G2258>wast<s%>; 2532, Exodus64 <S%G3754>because<s%> thou hast <S%G2983>taken<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> didst <S%G936>reign<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%> were <S%G3710>wroth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3709>wrath<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2540>time<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead<s%> to be <S%G2919>judged<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the time to <S%G1325>give<s%> their <S%G3408>reward<s%> to <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to the <S%G40>saints<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3588>them<s%> that <S%G5399>fear<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%>, the <S%G3398>small<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G1311>destroy<s%> <S%G3588>them<s%> that <S%G1311>destroy<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> there was <S%G455>opened<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> that is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> there was <S%G3700>seen<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3485>temple<s%> the <S%G2787>ark<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1242>covenant<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G1096>followed<s%> <S%G796>lightnings<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5456>voices<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1027>thunders<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> an <S%G4578>earthquake<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5464>hail<s%>.
